extension.description: Loads single lines of text from a predetermined text file to populate input fields in XBMC. I control XBMC by remote and I am sick of using the in-built, on-screen keyboard to type in long text strings. I want this service to recognise when a text input field is selected and loads a select screen populated with a bunch of common strings I use.
